content:
The news of Emaad's victory was short-lived, as it was soon revealed that he had cheated during the fight. An investigation was launched, and it was discovered that Emaad had been using performance-enhancing drugs in the weeks leading up to the fight.

The boxing community was shocked and outraged by the news. Emaad's reputation was permanently tarnished, and he was stripped of his title and banned from competition for several years.

Mustafa, on the other hand, was hailed as a hero for his sportsmanship and integrity. Despite the difficult circumstances, he had refused to cheat and had fought a clean fight.

In the end, the hyped boxing match between Emaad and Mustafa became a cautionary tale about the dangers of cheating and the importance of fair play.
